flowRoot.flowPara: If you are reading this document on your e-reader, then you have configured Dontprint correctly.

text.tspan: Turn page to configure the screen size...

flowRoot.flowPara: Go to the website of a publisher.
Log in or use your institution's proxy.
Navigate to an article. A Dontprint icon should appear (see screenshot). Click it!
Dontprint will download the article's PDF, optimize the layout for a small screen,
and send it to your e-reader.
Go ahead and try it out:
